description.ko: 이끼와 빛이 숨쉬는 수중 구조물로 융합되어 생명의 흐름을 상징하는 유기적 건축의 경이로움.
description.en: An organic architectural marvel where moss and light merge into a breathing underwater structure, symbolizing the flow of life.

prompt: A sprawling, pulsating neural network of bioluminescent #7FB069 emerald moss and #FFE66D glowing liquid sap, manifesting as a living cathedral in a deep #2D5A3D underwater trench. The structure is composed of translucent organic membranes and flowing liquid light tendrils that rhythmically breathe with nature. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Heavy subsurface scattering on the mossy fibers, volumetric light shafts piercing through dark water, and #E6F2E1 floating spores creating a sense of organic flow. Cinematic lighting highlights the microscopic texture of the breathing light of nature.
